user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable, stylish jeans that could be worn for various occasions while also providing practical features like deep pockets.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a pair of jeans that offered both style and comfort for everyday wear. The emphasis on performance-level comfort and the use of heavyweight cotton denim appealed to me, as I wanted something durable yet comfortable for all-day use. The deep front pockets were also a significant factor, as I needed practical storage for my essentials.

I was drawn to the idea of stylish jeans that promised comfort and functionality. However, my experience with the product did not meet my expectations, as I found them to be stiff even after washing. This led me to feel disappointed, as I had hoped for a more comfortable fit based on the product description.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer high quality, comfort, and good value for money. I appreciate items that arrive in excellent condition and meet or exceed my expectations in terms of fit and functionality. Features such as durability, comfort technology, and reliable sizing are important to me, as I tend to favor products that are well-constructed and designed for everyday use. On the other hand, I dislike products that have poor quality materials, inconsistent sizing, or that require excessive maintenance, such as frequent ironing or that do not fit as expected. Overall, I value products that combine style with practicality and that provide a satisfactory experience without complications.

What specific colors do you prefer for your jeans?
I prefer classic colors like dark blue or black for my jeans.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Levi's Men's Casual Everyday Jean Belt> / Item ID: B0BQHM9M2H / Price: $19.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Accessories', 'Belts'] / Description: ['In 1853, Levi Strauss, an immigrant from Bavaria, opened a dry goods company in San Francisco at the height of the California Gold Rush. While he was working, he recognized a need among hardworking people: clothes built to endure anything. He and tailor Jacob Davis combined copper rivet reinforcements with tough denim, leading to the first manufactured waist overalls in 1873.Today, we call them “blue jeans.” What started as an invention for the American worker became the uniform of progress. Worn by miners, cowboys, rebels, rock stars, presidents and everyday men and women, these functional pieces were the clothes people not only worked in—they lived their lives in, too. But Levi’s are more than that. They’re the purest wearable form of authentic self-expression. They bear the markings of life, the shapes of our bodies, the memories of our adventures.'] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Rustler Men's Classic Regular Fit> / Item ID: B09QT3J1S7 / Price: $15.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Jeans'] / Description: ['Thank us later for jeans that you don’t have to worry about. Each pair of Rustler jeans is made to be durable and long-lasting, all without sacrificing the comfort you want and the terrific value you expect. Available in a variety of colors and fits, our straight leg men’s jeans are sure to keep up, no matter the activity.'] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Wrangler Authentics Men's Short Sleeve Classic Plaid Shirt> / Item ID: B08MW6XF9M / Price: $25.07 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Shirts', 'Casual Button-Down Shirts'] / Description: ['The Wrangler Authentics collection delivers laid-back style for the man on the go. Performance-level comfort is built into our classic button-downs and blue jeans for an outfit that feels as good as it looks. Wrangler Authentics jeans are constructed with 5-pocket styling, made from heavyweight 100% cotton or premium flex denim and feature a comfortable waist with deep front pockets. Available with Advanced Comfort technology that helps your jeans move with you for all day comfort. Pair with your favorite Wrangler Authentics shirt for a night out or casual weekend.']
